memories.content: Starting /check task: Check git PRs, resolve conflicts, merge, then check UI with snap-happy screenshots. UI build issue with Tailwind CSS v4 not being picked up. Need to fix ALL issues found.

Analysis complete: Build succeeds but has 27 linting warnings. Tailwind v4 is properly configured with @import "tailwindcss" and @theme block. PostCSS config looks correct. Need to merge PR #4 and fix all linting warnings before testing UI.
